title: dc again...
body: after champ select i get disconnected from the game. i get the message: "UNABLE TO CONNECT TO THE SERVER. PLEASE CHECK YOUR CONNECTION AND ATTEMPT TO RECONNECT TO GAME". BUT THE THING IS I CANT RECONNECT. ITS ANOTHER LOST FOR ME AND I MIGHT GET LEAVER BUSTER. MY WIFI IS WORKING PERFECTLY FINE. 3 times in a row this week......

replies.body: Sorry to hear about the trouble here, it sounds like you might have a pretty unstable connection.  :(  Your wifi could be degrading as well and failing to reach the game server.  I suggest testing a wired connection to rule out possibilities with your wifi, otherwise the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help with troubleshooting.  I recommend testing it out in a custom game, though, to prevent leaverbuster penalties.
